document.title: Animating Page Transitions in Next.js
document.summary: A practical guide to smooth route transitions with Framer Motion.

body.raw: In this post, we implement route transitions using a template component and Framer Motion's `AnimatePresence`.

document.title: Analytics Dashboard
document.summary: Realtime charts, role-based access, and integrations.

body.raw:
## Overview
I built a performant dashboard with realtime metrics, row-level security, and a modular widget system.

- Server components for data-heavy views
- Streaming and Suspense for fast TTFB
- Framer Motion for micro-interactions

## Outcomes
- 1.7s â†’ 0.9s LCP
- 30% time-on-page increase
